relnotes.name: Telephony Watchers
relnotes.purpose: The telephony watchers monitor ETel telephony conditions such as Telephony Signal Strength, Battery Level, whether a call is in progress, etc.

defect.title: Removing dependencies on watcher.exe in Telephony

relnotes.defect: Modified logging so that the dependency on the CWatcherLog class (belonging to the Application Services OS layer) is removed.

defect.title: DP: Several Telephony components need MMP files updating for DP

relnotes.defect: Downgraded component from "Mandatory unpaged" to "Recommended unpaged"
